A C++ implmentation of camera class

May 31, 2017

Camera is the starting point of perceiving the world, and itâ€™s probably the single most component in the computer vision library.

The camera class should have the following methods:

  • IO: read to/write from file:
    • intrinsic and extrinsic parameters: type 0;
    • projection matrix.
  • set intrinsic and extrinsic parameters;
  • camera coordinate system: camera center and axes;
  • set/get matrix K, R, t, Rt, and P;
  • project/unproject;
  • compute depth
  • possiblly more
